mandator_explained: Customer id and license key are needed to use our service. If you are using a shop plugin, please enter them in the plugin configuration in order to activate the plugin. Otherwise you will find more detailed information in the documentation.

password_too_short: The chosen password must have at least 8 characters.
password_alpha_numeric_case: The new password you provided must contain at least: one number (0-9), one lowercase letter (a-z) and one uppercase letter (A-Z)!
